b.t.u..gloss: a unit of energy equal to the work done by a power of 1000 watts operating for one hour

b.th.u..gloss: a unit of heat equal to the amount of heat required to raise one pound of water one degree Fahrenheit at one atmosphere pressure

btu.gloss: a unit of heat equal to the amount of heat required to raise one pound of water one degree Fahrenheit at one atmosphere pressure
